name: Entropy Bolt
description: You launch a crackling bolt of chaotic energy at a creature within a short (10 unit) distance that decays matter it touches, dealing 5 aetheric damage if the target fails a defense check of 5. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, you and the target swap positions after the bolt resolves.
charge: This spell can target a transmutable, unequipped object that is under 5 bulk and destroy it.
